content.raw: @stgray thanks for the question. I have tested DART with srcsim, and it is faster than ODE when walking, but we have not spent as much time tuning contact parameters for DART, so we didn't have a chance to get grasping working as well as it does in ODE. There are also a few missing features in DART like heightmap support and dynamic joint creation for the harness.
